meanings.definition: The process of removing moisture from the air.
meanings.sent1: Dehumidifications are important in preventing mold growth.
meanings.sent2: The dehumidifications in the basement helped keep the air dry.
meanings.sent3: The dehumidifications in the room were so effective that even the walls felt less damp.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a dehumidifications machine, drying up the gloomy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The dehumidifications of the desert air made every breath feel like a sip of water.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing the humidity level in a space.
meanings.sent1: Regular dehumidifications can prevent musty odors in the house.
meanings.sent2: The dehumidifications in the office made it more comfortable to work in.
meanings.sent3: The dehumidifications during the rainy season turned the house into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent4: His presence had a dehumidifications effect on the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dehumidifications of her words calmed the heated argument.
